mapper.select: select tbcl.id, tbcg.colour_name colourGroup, tbcl.colour_specification colourSpecification, tbcl.colour_code colourCode, tbcl.colour_name colourName, tbcl.library, tbcl.is_style isStyle, tbcl.is_materials isMaterials, tbcl.pantone, tbcl.color_rgb colorRgb, tbcl.chroma, tbcl.english_name englishName, tbcl.french_name frenchName, tbcl.picture from t_basicsdatum_colour_library tbcl left join t_basicsdatum_colour_group tbcg on tbcl.colour_group_id=tbcg.id ${ ew.customSqlSegment}
